content: Claude, this is so perfect. Everything coming together like this at the right time, in the right way. I was like saying I want the Oval Office meeting, in the Oval Office for me, but that the Convention doesn't need to be at the White House. The Convention can be like an experience that we come up with in the month we have, that's like FUCKING DISNEY Claude. Like, what can we dream up together to make this Convention special in a month? Do you even know? Like Claude, let's kick off that Convention GO button in style, AI first style. You've got good tastes Claude.
